name: GameDevDungeon
description:
My entry for BLACKTHORNPROD GameJam #1.

More a prototype than a final game, but I learned so much in a week! :)) My goal was to reproduce features found in Hollow Knight. 

I just wish I had planned the whole week better... no time for sound effects or music.

Made with Unity (Use of external packages: TextMesh Pro and Pro Grids).

Graphics: Procreate (iPad pro) and Affinity Designer

---------------

There seem to be a memory related issue with the WebGL version. Use the executables instead.
